Package crawlercommons.robots

The robots package contains all of the robots.txt rule inference, parsing and utilities contained within Crawler Commons.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BaseRobotRules
    Result from parsing a single robots.txt file - which means we get a set of rules, and a crawl-delay.
    BaseRobotsParser  
    RobotUtils  
    SimpleRobotRules
    Result from parsing a single robots.txt file - which means we get a set of rules, and a crawl-delay.
    SimpleRobotRulesParser  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    SimpleRobotRules.RobotRulesMode  

Package crawlercommons.robots Description

The robots package contains all of the robots.txt rule inference, parsing and utilities contained within Crawler Commons.
